amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to reduce the salary of Jigar Shah, Director of the Loan Programs Office, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 257, 1 Present (Roll no. 378).

action.text: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Van Drew.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 257, 1 Present (Roll no. 378).
